S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4283: setEmbeddedCP should use return, not exit, on error
Since the setEmbeddedCP script is designed to be called from another script, or sourced from the shell, it should use 'return' rather than 'exit', to report an error.
This change was contributed by Susumu Ishizuka (susumuishizuka at ieee dot org)
